choose.when: SELECT r.* FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num WHERE u.rcp_title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe (user_num, pet_num, rcp_title, rcp_content, serving_size, cooking_time, cooking_level, ingredients, rcp_viewCount, rcp_regdate, main_path) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{petNum}, #{title}, #{content}, #{servingSize}, #{cookingTime}, #{cookingLevel}, #{ingredients}, #{viewCount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{mainPath})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.user_num AS userNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.main_path AS mainPath FROM recipe r
ORDER BY r.rcp_num DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{startRowNum}

SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.user_num AS userNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.main_path AS mainPath, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recipe_like rl WHERE rl.rcp_num = r.rcp_num AND rl.user_num = #{userNum}) AS liked FROM recipe r
ORDER BY r.rcp_num DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{startRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num

SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.user_num AS userNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.rcp_content AS content, r.serving_size AS servingSize, r.cooking_time AS cookingTime, r.cooking_level AS cookingLevel, r.ingredients, r.rcp_viewCount AS viewCount, r.rcp_regdate AS regdate, r.main_path AS mainPath, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.user_profile AS userProfile FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num WHERE r.rcp_num=#{rcpNum}

SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.user_num AS userNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.main_path AS mainPath FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num WHERE r.user_num = #{userNum} ORDER BY r.rcp_num DESC

SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.pet_num AS petNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.main_path AS mainPath FROM recipe r JOIN pet_type p ON r.pet_num = p.pet_type_id WHERE r.pet_num = #{petNum} ORDER BY r.rcp_num DESC
